title: .hack//Tasogare no Udewa Densetsu: Offline de Aimashou
original_name: .hack//黄昏の腕輪伝説 オフラインで会いましょう
sinopse: It's a short story about the characters from .hack// Legend of the Twilight meeting offline. It's more to hear than to see. It shows only backgrounds from the real world with the heads of the charater-game-avatars; but it reveals some interesting real life informations about the characters.
